faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions about our Prices
faqSection.subtitle: Transparent answers about costs and consultation

faqs.question: How are treatment costs determined?
faqs.answer: Each treatment is individually planned and calculated. The costs depend on the actual effort, the number of grafts and your personal wishes. The stated prices serve as guidance - after consultation you will receive your individual offer.

faqs.question: Why do all prices start with 'from'?
faqs.answer: Because every patient is unique! The final price depends on many factors: How many grafts do you need? Which method is optimal? Which additional services do you want? After personal consultation, you know exactly what your treatment costs.

faqs.question: Are there hidden costs?
faqs.answer: No, definitely not! Transparency is important to us. The guide prices show the basic services. If additional treatments make sense, we discuss this thoroughly with you. You always receive a clear, understandable cost breakdown.

faqs.question: How is my individual need determined?
faqs.answer: In a detailed consultation, we analyze your situation: What is the current condition? What are your wishes? Which method fits best? Factors such as treatment area, desired density and your hair type flow into the planning.
